_comment: TODO: Fill in the remaining character translations using scripts/build-translation-skeleton.ts as a reference.

achilles.name: Achilles
achilles.description: Hero of the Trojan War, famed for his near invincibility.

medusa.name: Medusa
medusa.description: Gorgon whose gaze turns onlookers to stone.

robin-hood.name: Robin Hood
robin-hood.description: Outlaw archer who steals from the rich to aid the poor.

king-arthur.name: King Arthur
king-arthur.description: Legendary ruler of Camelot and leader of the Knights of the Round Table.

merlin.name: Merlin
merlin.description: Enigmatic wizard and counselor to King Arthur.

joan-of-arc.name: Joan of Arc
joan-of-arc.description: French heroine who led troops during the Hundred Years' War.

sherlock-holmes.name: Sherlock Holmes
sherlock-holmes.description: Brilliant detective known for deduction and keen observation.

little-red-riding-hood.name: Little Red Riding Hood
little-red-riding-hood.description: Young girl who meets a cunning wolf on the way to her grandmother.

dracula.name: Count Dracula
dracula.description: Transylvanian vampire lord from Bram Stoker's novel.
